title: Dolce Gusto Timer
summary: The app helps in the preparation of Dolce Gusto beverages.
developerAddress:

Santa Rita do Sapucaí - MG - 37540-000

descriptionHTML:
The Dolce Gusto Timer application helps in the preparation of Dolce Gusto beverages in non-automatic machines indicating switching off the machine according to the chosen beverage using an audible alarm and vibrating the device.
Also includes records of beverages to control their personal stock of capsules, with the option to warn when the capsules are finished.
It has a control as being the preparation of beverages and monthly historical recent months.
Configuration screen to enable/disable alarm and vibration, volume verification.
Option of preparing the beverage using the level indicated in the capsule.

The trademark “DOLCE GUSTO” is a registered trademark of Société des Produits Nestlé S.A.. Dolce Gusto Timer is not an official application and its developer is not associated with any Nestlé-affiliated company nor it is an authorized retailer of Nestlé products or services.

Special thanks:

- George D. Flamouris (greek translation);
- Jeroen Stikkers (dutch translation);
- Ronni Johansson (danish translation);
- Stefania Falleni (italian translation).

comments: Gostei Reparei que quando se faz o café pelo timer level, ele fica melhor do que quando você escolhe o tipo de café .. até pq o tempo do timer level é um pouco menor
Great for an old machine. I was making a mess of thevtimings until I found this app. Very useful, but the buttons could be a wee bit prettier.
Ótimo! Integra o consumo com a manutenção do estoque! Super útil!
Handy Tool Does what it says on the tin. I like the new features in this update especially the search  function.
Brilliant idea Works well makes it easier with simple machines
recentChanges: Beverages times greater than 200ml were corrected.
Times are based on the size of each capsule. If you find it more convenient, you can also use the timer by level, which follows the time recommended by the manufacturer.
